summary: All three requirements (REQ-6, REQ-7, REQ-8) appear to be fully implemented in the diff. The backend main.mo returns the correct store info, and all frontend components (Header, HeroSection, AboutUsSection, Footer) display 'Sameer Medical', the correct phone, hours, and location with proper fallback defaults.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added with OldActor and NewActor types and a run function, and the actor was decorated with (with migration = Migration.run).
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked to update store info fields in the backend. Adding a migration module and wiring it to the actor was not requested.
